translation.Access to and use of password protected: Access to and use of password protected or secured areas of the Site are restricted to authorized users only. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of password(s) and account information, and you are responsible for all activities that occur through the use of any password(s) or account(s), or as a result of your access to the Site. You agree to notify Sterling immediately of any unauthorized use of password(s) or account(s).
